Title: AKA Take a Bloody Number
Writer: Brian Michael Bendis (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Michael Gaydos (based on the character from the Marvel comics by), Melissa Rosenberg (created by), Hilly Hicks Jr., Jenna Reback (staff writer)
Actors: Krysten Ritter, Mike Colter, Rachael Taylor, Eka Darville
Plot: The hunt for Kilgrave reunites Jessica with Luke. Trish receives some unexpected information about Simpson and Jessica.
